title: Set for Life results LIVE: Winning National Lottery numbers for Thursday, October 24
text:
Someone won tonight's National Lottery.

With an incredible top prize of £10,000 landing in your bank account every month and this lasting for a whopping 30 years - it's no wonder Set For Life has become such a hit.

Here are the results you need to be a winner and pocket £10,000 every month.

The numbers are 4, 12, 17, 28, 36 and the life ball is 7.

The game from the UK National Lottery is proving popular and tonight is the latest of the weekly draws.

Five people have won big since the new competition Set For Life was created earlier in 2019.

Other prizes include £10,000 every month for the next year for matching just five numbers or £250 for matching four balls and the 'Life Ball'.

Scroll through our live blog below to get the winning numbers as soon as the balls fall.

Get those tickets to hand - and good luck.
description: Tonight's winning numbers for the National Lottery are published here
